meanings.definition: A point on a scale of one hundred that divides a distribution of a set of data into one hundred equal parts.
meanings.sent1: The centile marked the exact middle of the data distribution.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the 50th centile is the median of the dataset.
meanings.sent3: At the centile party, everyone was divided into equal groups of one hundred.
meanings.sent4: Her performance was off the centile, standing out from the rest.
meanings.sent5: The centile acted as a clear marker for comparison among the data points.

meanings.definition: One of the one hundred equal parts of a distribution of a set of data.
meanings.sent1: Each centile represented a small fraction of the overall data set.
meanings.sent2: The 75th centile indicated a higher value compared to the lower percentiles.
meanings.sent3: The centile slices of cake were perfectly portioned for everyone.
meanings.sent4: In the centile of friends, she was the most reliable and trustworthy.
meanings.sent5: The centile division helped in understanding the data distribution better.
